intro.content:
Howdy comrades!

To start the weekend on the right foot here a nice newsletter filled with joyful content.
This week I worked quite a lot on automating the process of relaying editions across social medias (yeah it's done!). So, from time to time you'll now see posts showing up automatically on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram (yeah X2).

I wish you a wonderful weekend!

hero.title: Cheese actually isn’t bad for you!
hero.description: Don’t feel sheepish reaching for that Gruyère. Cheese doesn’t deserve its unhealthy reputation.
hero.why:
I won't lie, when I saw this article coming up in my feed, I immediately clicked on it.
I am personally a huge cheese fan and since a very young age I have always loved it (my parents even put it it on my yogurts - the only way I would eat it)!
Well, reading this article it looks like I have now the perfect excuse to eat even more!

randomArticles.title: Gamers Forge Their Own Paths When It Comes to Accessibility
randomArticles.description: Players with disabilities haven't waited around for console manufacturers. Here's how far we've come—and how far we have to go.

randomArticles.title: NASA's mars parachute had a hidden code: “Dare mighty things!”
randomArticles.description: Meet the French student who cracked it.

randomArticles.title: The elephant who received a prosthetic leg after a landmine explosion
randomArticles.description: Meet Mosha, the Asian elephant, received the first prosthetic limb made especially for her species.

randomArticles.title: When The Prison Banned Board Games, We Played Chess In Our Minds
randomArticles.description: “At the heart of our mental chess game lies a profound lesson: The difference between being content or distraught is a matter of perspective.”

randomArticles.title: Life Lessons From 100-Year-Olds
randomArticles.description: We asked three unique and lovely centenarians what their most valuable life lessons were, and also their regrets.

animalCorner.title: This photograph takes outstanding pictures of your doggos
animalCorner.description: See Instagram photos and videos from @vincentjmusi

animalCorner.title: Please hug me
animalCorner.description: Everything you need now from your cat!
